thread_replies.author: 家猫と元庭猫の日記
thread_replies.text:
Ten-chan  
I'm living strong and steady.  

Even when I rescued her, drool was dripping, her nose was running, tears were pooling, and her face was all scrunched up  

But her eyes alone were sharp and brimming with vitality.  

Even now, unchanged  
Cherishing every day, every
